job.title: Software Engineer

job.description: strongPlease apply on our Careers page at brbrstrongExtended Care Pro is a marketleading software solution that enables longterm care facilities to better care for their residents Already used in over 2000 facilities across the United States Extended Care Pro is looking to further expand by increasing the number of customers that use our software and increasing the scope of how we serve our customers by developing and releasing new modulesbrbrThis role will join our software engineering team on projects in React Nodejs and TypeScript They will contribute to both brand new projects ike building a customerfacing billing product and updates to our existing products Longterm we are planning to replace all our existing code with this new tech stackbrbrWe expect you to be able to hit the ground running and be able to take the lead on small to mediumsized projects within six months This fullstack software engineer will report to the head of technology and have access to the rest of the leadership teambrbrstrongPrimary ResponsibilitiesbrstrongulliContribute to daytoday development contribute tested documented code to solve business problemsliliContinually improve platform Understand how the work you contribute will fit into our overall development pipelinebrbrliulstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli25 years of JavaScript development
